page.title: 17JAMES' SCHOOLDAY IN NENTHEAD
page.content: I got up at 7.30 a.m..My Mum was making my Dad a cup of tea.Then she made his sandwiches and flask of tea for his bait.He went to work.I had a bowl of "Frosties"<sugar-coated cereal> for breakfast.I let the dog out and put our goat out in the field. 8.40 a.m.I set off walking to school.I played Relieve-O in the school play- ground till 9.15 a.m.I went to my classroom,I wrote about getting my glasses from the opticians in Hexham, then I read my library book.At break- time I played Chain Tiggy.After I did some sharing sums .Then I had Cumber- land stew and ice-cream for dinner. After dinner I played football on the field.In the afternoon I did some history and some rounders practice. I got home at 3.30 p.m.,I played out on my BMX bike.I had baked beans for tea.I watched T.V and went to bed.
